author: Xanawatt (Xanawatt#8365)
name: Quotes
description: A collection of tools for recording arbitrary text quotes. Currently provides the ability to get a quote by index, get a random quote, list all quotes and add, edit, and delete quotes.
short: Record and save your favorite quotes.
install_msg: Thank you for installing! If you encounter any problems, I am in the official Red discord server @Xanawatt#8365. Feel free to Dm aswell.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
